All Implemented Interfaces:
EncryptedDataParser, org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class EncryptedDataSAXParser
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
implements EncryptedDataParser

Implementation class for reading and writing encrypted files using a SAX parser
